sense.gloss: operating together, working together, being linked (to), being tied (to), being connected (with), interlocking

sdata.j: エンジンを↑前輪↑↓ぜんりん↓に↑連動↑↓|れんどう|↓させてください。
sdata.e: Gear the engine to the front wheels.

sdata.j: ↑肩↑↓かた↓↑関節↑↓かんせつ↓は、↑単独↑↓たんどく↓で↑動↑↓うご↓くほか、↑腕↑↓うで↓の↑動↑↓うご↓きにも↑連動↑↓|れんどう|↓して↑動↑↓うご↓きます。
sdata.e: The shoulder joints, as well as moving on their own, also move in conjunction with arm movements.
